```{r}
#| label: cvevents
cvevents <- function(tbl, when, what, where, descr) {

    command_start <- "\\cvevent"
    tbl[[where]] <- gsub("\n", " \\\\newline ", tbl[[where]])
    res <- paste0(
        command_start, "{", tbl[[when]], "}", 
        "{", tbl[[what]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[where]], "}"#,
        # "{", tbl[[descr]], "}"
        )

    cat(res, sep = "\n\n\n")
}

```
